SELECT review_board_num,user.user_num,review_board_recipe_id,review_board_title,review_board_content, review_board_img,review_board_views,review_board_likes, date_format(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d') as review_board_created_at, user_nickname from review_board rb inner join user on rb.user_num = user.user_num order by review_board_num asc;
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET review_board_views = review_board_views + 1 WHERE review_board_num = #{reviewBoardNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board ( user_num, review_board_recipe_id, review_board_title, review_board_content, review_board_img, review_board_views, review_board_likes ) VALUES (#{userNum},null,#{reviewBoardTitle},#{reviewBoardContent},#{reviewBoardImg},#{reviewBoardViews}, #{reviewBoardLikes})
INSERT INTO comment (user_num, board_num, comment_content) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{boardNum}, #{commentContent})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_num, user_num, board_num, comment_content, comment_created_at FROM comment WHERE board_num = #{boardNum} ORDER BY comment_created_at ASC
